Interface TriggerEvent

All Known Implementing Classes:
TriggerEventImpl
public interface TriggerEvent

Method Summary
 String getAuthor()
          Returns the name of the author of the message;
 String getMessage()
          Returns the message that triggered this command, without the trigger.
 String getOriginalMessage()
          Returns the message that triggered this command, unaltered.
 Collection<String> getUsers()
          Returns a list of users on the channel
 boolean isBotInMessage()
          Returns true if the name of the bot is in the message
 boolean isNickInMessage()
          Returns true if the message contains a nickname from one of the users on the chan
 boolean isStartsWithTrigger()
          Returns true if the message starts with an existing trigger.

getOriginalMessage

String getOriginalMessage()
Returns the message that triggered this command, unaltered.

Returns:
the original message, null for methods annotated with TimedAction

Returns the message that triggered this command, without the trigger.

Returns:
the the message without the trigger, null for methods annotated with TimedAction

getAuthor

String getAuthor()
Returns the name of the author of the message;

Returns:
the nick name of the author, null for methods annotated with TimedAction

getUsers

Collection<String> getUsers()
Returns a list of users on the channel

Returns:
a list of users

isNickInMessage

boolean isNickInMessage()
Returns true if the message contains a nickname from one of the users on the chan

Returns:
true if someone was highlighted, false if not or for methods annotated with TimedAction

isBotInMessage

boolean isBotInMessage()
Returns true if the name of the bot is in the message

Returns:
true if the bot was highlighted, false if not or for methods annotated with TimedAction

isStartsWithTrigger

boolean isStartsWithTrigger()
Returns true if the message starts with an existing trigger. Useful for commands with TriggerType.EVERYTHING

Returns:
true if the message starts with an existing trigger registered in the bot.
